ingredients: DOUGH: 2 3/4 cups all-purpose flour 1/4 cup granulated white sugar 3/4 teaspoon salt 1 Tablespoon baking powder 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg 1/2 cup butter, cut into small pieces 2 cups cinnamon chips 1 large egg 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 3/4 cup eggnog TOPPING: 1 Tablespoon (or more) eggnog 2 Tablespoons sparkling white sugar (or cinnamon sugar)
